question: Dear Doctor,I am 26 years old and i was diagnosed with diabetes at the age of 16.i have been taking very good good and keeping in check my diabetes till date my sugar reported 100 in the morning and 145 later in the day.for the past one week i have been observing a flower like development on my penis.there is no absloutely no irritation but a lot of pain. i havent been to any sex worker nor i have had sex with multiple partners i always use protection during sex.i also maintain a good hygeine.i would like to know whether this is common with diabetic individuals or i need attention.thankyou
title: infection on penis
